name: Der Verlassene Planet
overview: Der Verlassene Planet (German for The Abandoned Planet) is a German language graphical text adventure developed in 1989 by Hannes Seifert and publishd by Markt & Technik in 64'er Software Extra Nr.15: Abenteuer-Spiele. In the year 1998 you left Earth in a spaceship to investigate an unknown planet. The computer of the spaceship however malfunctions and it returns you to Earth, but on arriving it appears that humanity has self-destructed. However some have survived...
